roleset.name: adapt poorly
roleset.note: MALADAPT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: maladapt-v
example.text: Yet studies have shown that [the cane toads themselves]-1 are maladapted *-1 to their new environment because they are more vulnerable to local meat ants than native frogs.
example.arg: because they are more vulnerable to local meat ants than native frogs

example.name: maladaption-n
example.text: Consistent with a maladaptation of fatty acid oxidation, cardiac power (measured ex vivo) decreased with long term western diet only.
